title: General Whitelist
notes: These are words we beleive are safe

title: Remove PERSON
exclude: This will use the NER tagging and remove any words it thinks are PERSON

title: Vitamin B shortcode matcher
notes: Matches known vitamin short codes B1 B12 B6 etc. By Blake Allen

title: Medicine Tablet matcher
notes: Matches numbers that come before the word tablet(s)

title: All Digits
notes: Greedy catches anything with digits in it
